The best backpacking trails in Patagonia include the W Trek in Torres del Paine, the Huemul Circuit, and the Dientes Circuit.

What is the best time of year to go backpacking in Patagonia?

Searching for the best time of year to go backpacking in Patagonia.
The best time to go backpacking in Patagonia is from November to March, during the Southern Hemisphere summer.
